title: Is there a deadline to file the I-485 form once that the priority date has become currrent in the visa bulletin?
question: I was petitioned by my brother through the I-130 and it has been around three months since I checked that my priority date appeared in the visa bulletin. I am still gathering funds to file the I-485. Thank you in advance.
answers:
There is no deadline but faster you go better it is. We have often seen such bulletin "retrogressed". This means that the date goes backward. So until the next bulletin kicks in, you should consider this as your timeframe. Talk to a good lawyer if you are confused.

Good Luck
